bibl.title: Envisioning Magic. A Princeton Seminar and Symposium. (Studies in the History of Religions - Numen Book Series. 75.)
bibl.note: 12 essays presented during a seminar (1994/1995) and an international symposium on March 27 and 28, 1995, at the Institute for Advanced Study at Princeton. - Pp. 273-274: Index of Sources; - 275-281: Index of Names and Subjects.
bibl.seg: SCHÄFER Peter and Hans G. KIPPENBERG (Edd.), Envisioning Magic. A Princeton Seminar and Symposium. (Studies in the History of Religions - Numen Book Series. 75.)
